PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- Rice, Side Dishes + Canvas Pouch
- Perfect for students who are in the middle of eating and working people who are late due to overtime work, etc
- Comes with a 2-way pouch that allows to put in simple light meals by removing the button.
- Warm lunch box that includes a vacuum double-structured stainless steel thermal case, a rice container, 2 meal containers, and a chopstick with box. With a 2-way pouch.
- Rice containers about 1.6 cups (rice) & about 2.3 cups (Thermal case)
- Thermal case, containers set, chopsticks, and chopsticks box can be washed completely.
- Plastic containers are all microwavable except the lids. *Stainless steel containers cannot be microwaved.*

- Individual capacity:-
・ Thermal case: 0.47L
・ Rice container: 0.32L
・ Meal containers : 0.31L × 2
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (6HRS) :-
<When not in the pouch> 53 ° C or higher
<When in the pouch> 56 ° C or higher

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
1. For sports and camp activities.
2. Keep your beverages hot or cold. 
3. Saving energy! Put your cold beverage in the keeper to redue the frequency to open the fridge in order to get your cold beverage.  
4. Pull the angles of the dispensing lever to adjust the beverage amount dispensed.   
5. It is convenient to drink the beverage with two cups 
6. With inner cover to prevent dust from entering the beverage in the keeper. 
7. With foldable legs, convenient for storage.          
8 Easy to carry the keeper with handle design.     
9 Wide mouth design-easy to clean.     
10. Detachable tap-easy to clean. 
11. Inner tank made of aluminum.
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (10HRS) : Above 70° C 
- Cold Retention (10HRS) : Below 10° C
